amendment.description: Amendment sought to reduce the maximum sentences in the bill for illegal entry and unlawful presence to six months.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 7 printed in House Report 109-350 to reduce the maximum sentence for illegal entry and illegal presence to six months.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Sensenbrenner amendment (A019) Failed by recorded vote: 164 - 257 (Roll no. 655).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A019) offered by Mr. Sensenbrenner.
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Sensenbrenner amendment (A019) Failed by recorded vote: 164 - 257 (Roll no. 655).
